descriptionHtml:
Steam version got already more spells i will update here when i got more content
Steam version got 2 more spells at the moment and changes the weather to have bolts too (but they dont hit anything)




Ok so i redone the spell and made some new + added a mechanic

[youtube]1YyLRfyjbYc[/youtube]
I greatly incrased the cast time and mana cost 

The books are in the same place like in the picture but in a chest that is locked

Spells:

- Summon Rain : needet to cast any bolt spells!! last 3 minutes or till you cast it again
- Summon 1 bolt
- Summon 4 bolts
- Summon 7 bolts : This one fires 6 times the 7th one is 6 at once and leaves a Electric field
- Summon 9 bolts : This one fires in a circle around the target point every bolt leaves a Electric field

Bolts dealing around 200 dmg explosion deals 250 in 25 area
The bolt hitbox is very small so there is a low chance you hit with bolt and explosion but if both hits , its like an instant kill

removed the armor gain on spell begin to make it more challenging




have fun with it =)


requires Dawnguard DLC

thanks to verteiron for the script permission look for his mod summon meteor
